corpus_info.name: Complete PID Safety Corpus for OntoGPT Research
corpus_info.description: Complete 86-sentence corpus with processing strategy analysis
corpus_info.research_objective: OntoGPT limitations analysis and improvement proposals

data.original_korean: 도면에는 공정 또는 지역 등을 포함하여 고유의 도면번호를 부여하여야 한다
data.translated_english: The drawing shall be given a unique drawing number, including a process or region.
data.enhanced_english: The drawing shall be given a unique drawing number, including a process or region.

data.original_korean: 장치 및 기계, 배관, 계장 등 고유번호 부여 체계
data.translated_english: Unique number assignment systems such as devices and machines, machines, pipes, and chiefs
data.enhanced_english: Unique number assignment systems such as devices and machines, machines, pipes, and chiefs

data.original_korean: 공정배관계장도에 사용되는 부호(Symbol) 및 범례도(Legend)
data.translated_english: Symbol and legendary diagram used in the map of the process.
data.enhanced_english: Symbol and legendary diagram used in the map of the process.

data.original_korean: 도면은 약어와 부호(Symbol)를 이용하여 간단하고 일목요연하게 작성한다
data.translated_english: The drawings are written simply by using abbreviations and symbols.
data.enhanced_english: The drawings are written simply by using abbreviations and symbols.

data.original_korean: 원본을 수정한 후에는 수정내용, 수정일자 및 수정자 등을 기록하여야 한다
data.translated_english: After modifying the original, the modification contents, modification date, and modifier shall be recorded.
data.enhanced_english: After modifying the original, the modification contents, modification date, and modifier shall be recorded.

data.original_korean: 모든 배관 및 닥트와 유체의 흐름방향 등이 표시되어야 하며
data.translated_english: All pipes and docks and fluid directions should be displayed.
data.enhanced_english: Piping system All pipes and docks and fluid directions should be displayed.

data.original_korean: 배관 및 닥트의 호칭지름, 배관번호, 재질, 플렌지 호칭압력
data.translated_english: Piping and ducts of the title, piping number, material, flange name pressure
data.enhanced_english: Piping system Piping and ducts of the title, piping number, material, flange name pressure

data.original_korean: 배관 및 닥트의 호칭지름, 배관번호, 재질, 플렌지 호칭압력
data.translated_english: Piping and ducts of the title, piping number, material, flange name pressure
data.enhanced_english: Piping system Piping and ducts of the title, piping number, material, flange name pressure

data.original_korean: 배관 및 닥트의 호칭지름, 배관번호, 재질, 플렌지 호칭압력
data.translated_english: Piping and ducts of the title, piping number, material, flange name pressure
data.enhanced_english: Piping system Piping and ducts of the title, piping number, material, flange name pressure

data.original_korean: 배관 및 닥트의 호칭지름, 배관번호, 재질, 플렌지 호칭압력
data.translated_english: Piping and ducts of the title, piping number, material, flange name pressure
data.enhanced_english: Piping system Piping and ducts of the title, piping number, material, flange name pressure

data.original_korean: 단열의 목적에 따라 아래와 같이 나타낸다. -P : Personnel protection -H : Heat conservation -C : Cold insulation
data.translated_english: It is represented below according to the purpose of insulation. -P: Personnel Protection -h: Heat Conservation -C: Cold Insulation
data.enhanced_english: It is represented below according to the purpose of insulation. -P: Personnel Protection -h: Heat Conservation -C: Cold Insulation

data.original_korean: 트레이싱의 종류에 따라 아래와 같이 나타낸다. -ET : Electrical tracing -ST : Steam tracing
data.translated_english: It is shown as follows according to the type of tracing. -ET: Electrical Tracing -st: Steam Tracing
data.enhanced_english: It is shown as follows according to the type of tracing. -ET: Electrical Tracing -st: Steam Tracing

data.original_korean: API 5L 배관 호칭지름 DN/NPS 표준 준수
data.translated_english: API 5L Piping Tinging DN/NPS Standard Compliance
data.enhanced_english: API 5L Piping Tinging DN/NPS Standard Compliance

data.original_korean: 배관 외경은 API 5L, ASME B36.10/19 규격 준수
data.translated_english: Piping is 5L of API, ASME B36.10/19 Standards Compliance
data.enhanced_english: Piping is 5L of API, ASME pressure vessel standard B36.10/19 Standards Compliance

data.original_korean: 배관 두께는 SCH 5, 10, 20, 40 표준
data.translated_english: Plumbing thickness is SCH 5, 10, 20, 40 standards
data.enhanced_english: Plumbing thickness is SCH 5, 10, 20, 40 standards

data.original_korean: 배관 재질 등급 Gr.B, X42, X52, X56, X60
data.translated_english: Piping material grade gr.b, x42, x52, x56, x60
data.enhanced_english: Piping system Piping material grade gr.b, x42, x52, x56, x60

data.original_korean: 제품 사양 레벨 PSL1 또는 PSL2 적용
data.translated_english: Product specifications PSL1 or PSL2 application
data.enhanced_english: Product specifications PSL1 or PSL2 application

data.original_korean: 자동조절밸브의 고장 모드(Failure mode)는 배관 및 계장도(P&ID) 및 밸브의 사양에 다음의 고장 모드 중 하나를 명기하여야 한다. -고장 시 열림(Fail open) -고장 시 닫힘(Fail close) -고장 시 상태로 있음(Fail in place)
data.translated_english: The failure mode of the automatic adjustment valve shall specify one of the following failure modes in the specifications of the piping and the P & ID and the valve. -Fail Open -Fail Close -Fail in Place
data.enhanced_english: Safety valve equipment The failure mode of the automatic adjustment valve shall specify one of the following failure modes in the specifications of the piping and the P & ID and the valve. -Fail Open -Fail Close -Fail in Place

data.original_korean: 밸브 압력 등급 ASME B16.34 Class 적용
data.translated_english: Valve Pressure Rating ASME B16.34 Class Application
data.enhanced_english: Valve Pressure Rating ASME pressure vessel standard B16.34 pressure rating class Application

data.original_korean: 원심펌프는 API 610 표준 펌프 타입을 준수한다
data.translated_english: The centrifugal pump comply with the API 610 standard pump type
data.enhanced_english: The centrifugal pump comply with the API 610 centrifugal pump standard standard pump type

data.original_korean: NPSH 여유는 API 610 기준 최소 0.9m 이상
data.translated_english: NPSH is at least 0.9m at API 610
data.enhanced_english: NPSH is at least 0.9m at API 610

data.original_korean: 고유번호, 종류, 형식, 기능
data.translated_english: Unique number, type, format, function
data.enhanced_english: Unique number, type, format, function

data.original_korean: 모든 계기는 동그라미에 계기번호를 표시하여야 하며
data.translated_english: All instruments must be displayed in the circle.
data.enhanced_english: All instruments must be displayed in the circle.

data.original_korean: 분산제어시스템(DCS) 또는 아날로그 등 제어장치의 구분
data.translated_english: Division of control devices such as distributed control system (DCS) or analog
data.enhanced_english: Division of control devices such as distributed control system (DCS) or analog

data.enhanced_english: Unique number assignment systems such as devices and machines, machines, pipes, and chiefs

data.translated_english: Major specifications such as unique numbers, names, capacity, heating amount and material of all devices and devices
data.enhanced_english: Major specifications such as unique numbers, names, capacity, heating amount and material of all devices and devices

data.enhanced_english: Major specifications such as unique numbers, names, capacity, heating amount and material of all devices and devices

data.enhanced_english: Major specifications such as unique numbers, names, capacity, heating amount and material of all devices and devices

data.original_korean: 도면에 기기를 배치함에 있어서 축척을 사용할 필요는 없으나 상대적 높이와 크기를 표시하며

data.enhanced_english: It is not necessary to use the scale in placing the device in the drawing, but indicates the relative height and size.

data.enhanced_english: Unique number assignment systems such as devices and machines, machines, pipes, and chiefs

data.original_korean: 배관은 호칭지름 20mm(3/4 inch) 이상을 사용한다
data.translated_english: The pipe uses 20 mm (3/4 inch) or more
data.enhanced_english: The pipe uses 20 mm (3/4 inch) or more

data.original_korean: 정상운전, 시운전시에 필요한 모든 배관에 설치되어 있는 벤트 및 드레인
data.translated_english: Bent and drain installed in all pipes needed for normal driving or commissioning
data.enhanced_english: Piping system Bent and drain installed in all pipes needed for normal driving or commissioning

data.original_korean: 하나의 유체가 2매 이상의 도면으로 연결되는 경우에는 연결되는 도면번호 및 연결장치 등의 고유번호 등을 표기
data.translated_english: When one fluid is connected to two or more drawings, the uniqueness of the drawing number and connection device, etc.
data.enhanced_english: When one fluid is connected to two or more drawings, the uniqueness of the drawing number and connection device, etc.

data.original_korean: 공급범위 등 기타 특수조건 등의 표기
data.translated_english: Notification of other special conditions such as supply range
data.enhanced_english: Notification of other special conditions such as supply range

data.original_korean: 특별한 경우에는 배관의 경사 및 장치의 지지대 높이등을 명기한다
data.translated_english: In special cases, the slope of the pipe and the height of the support of the device shall be specified.
data.enhanced_english: In special cases, the slope of the pipe and the height of the support of the device shall be specified.

data.original_korean: 배관의 재질이 바뀌는 위치 및 크기
data.translated_english: Location and size where the material of the pipe changes
data.enhanced_english: Piping system Location and size where the material of the pipe changes

data.translated_english: In the case of tops, reactors, and drums,
data.enhanced_english: In the case of tops, reactors, and drums,

data.original_korean: 모든 차단밸브 및 밸브의 종류
data.translated_english: Types of all blocking valves and valves
data.enhanced_english: Safety valve equipment Types of all blocking valves and valves

data.original_korean: 안전밸브의 크기, 설정압력 및 토출측 연결부위의 조건
data.translated_english: Conditions of the size of the safety valve, the setting pressure and the discharge side connection site
data.enhanced_english: Safety valve equipment Conditions of the size of the safety valve, the setting pressure and the discharge side connection site

data.original_korean: 안전밸브의 크기, 설정압력 및 토출측 연결부위의 조건
data.translated_english: Conditions of the size of the safety valve, the setting pressure and the discharge side connection site
data.enhanced_english: Safety valve equipment Conditions of the size of the safety valve, the setting pressure and the discharge side connection site

data.original_korean: 계장용 배관 및 계기의 보온종류
data.translated_english: Types of thermal insulation and instrumentation
data.enhanced_english: Types of thermal insulation and instrumentation

data.original_korean: 운전온도가 215℃를 넘을 경우 전기 트레이싱은 사용하지 않는다
data.translated_english: If the operation temperature exceeds 215 ℃, electric tracing is not used.
data.enhanced_english: If the operation temperature exceeds 215 ℃, electric tracing is not used.

data.original_korean: 보통 65℃ 이상으로 운전되고 열 보전을 위한 단열이 없는 배관과 장치의 표면은 운전자보호를 위한 단열을 한다
data.translated_english: Usually, the surface of a pipe and a device that operates above 65 ° C.
data.enhanced_english: Usually, the surface of a pipe and a device that operates above 65 ° C.

data.original_korean: 운전온도가 215℃를 넘을 경우 전기 트레이싱은 사용하지 않는다
data.translated_english: If the operation temperature exceeds 215 ℃, electric tracing is not used.
data.enhanced_english: If the operation temperature exceeds 215 ℃, electric tracing is not used.

data.original_korean: 탄소강(KCS, Killed Carbon Steel)은 압력과 상관없이 -29℃ 이하 또는 425℃ 이상의 온도에서 사용해서는 안 된다
data.translated_english: Killed carbon steel (KCS, Killed Carbon Steel) should not be used at temperatures below -29 ℃ or at temperatures above 425 ° C.
data.enhanced_english: Killed carbon steel (KCS, Killed Carbon Steel) should not be used at temperatures below -29 ℃ or at temperatures above 425 ° C.

data.original_korean: 특별한 경우에는 배관의 경사 및 장치의 지지대 높이등을 명기한다
data.translated_english: In special cases, the slope of the pipe and the height of the support of the device shall be specified.
data.enhanced_english: In special cases, the slope of the pipe and the height of the support of the device shall be specified.

data.original_korean: 운전온도가 215℃를 넘을 경우 전기 트레이싱은 사용하지 않는다
data.translated_english: If the operation temperature exceeds 215 ℃, electric tracing is not used.
data.enhanced_english: If the operation temperature exceeds 215 ℃, electric tracing is not used.

data.original_korean: 비정상운전 및 안전운전을 위한 연동시스템
data.translated_english: Interlocking system for abnormal driving and safe driving
data.enhanced_english: Interlocking system for abnormal driving and safe driving

data.original_korean: 공기 또는 전기 등 신호라인(Signal line)
data.translated_english: Signal Line such as air or electricity
data.enhanced_english: Signal Line such as air or electricity

data.original_korean: 긴급 차단 밸브(Emergency isolation valve)는 인화성 유체 또는 독성 물질의 대량 손실을 막기 위하여 설치한다
data.translated_english: Emergency isolation valve is installed to prevent mass loss of fluid fluid or toxic substances
data.enhanced_english: Emergency isolation valve is installed to prevent mass loss of fluid fluid or toxic substances

data.original_korean: 독성물질을 함유한 타워(Tower)의 모든 드레인은 이중차단을 하여야 한다
data.translated_english: All drains in the tower containing toxic substances must be blocked.
data.enhanced_english: All drains in the tower containing toxic substances must be blocked.

data.original_korean: 상압저장탱크에는 과압 방지를 위하여 벤트, 일류(Overflow), 두 개의 최고 수위 경보(High level alarm) 또는 차단(Shutdown) 시스템과 API 과압방지기(Overpressure protection)를 설치하여야 한다
data.translated_english: In the normal pressure storage tank, the two high level alarms, a shutdown system and an overpressed protection protection system must be installed to prevent over pressure to prevent over pressure.
data.enhanced_english: In the normal pressure storage tank, the two high level alarms, a shutdown system and an overpressed protection protection system must be installed to prevent over pressure to prevent over pressure.

data.original_korean: 탑류, 반응기 및 드럼 등의 경우에는 맨홀, 트레이(Tray)의 단수, 분배기(Distributor) 등 내부의 간단한 구조 및 부속품
data.translated_english: In the case of tops, reactors and drums, etc.
data.enhanced_english: In the case of tops, reactors and drums, etc.

data.original_korean: 모든 조절밸브의 밸브구동기(Valve actuator)를 포함한 제어계통, 정전과 같은 이상 시 밸브의 개폐 위치(Fail position) 등을 표시한다
data.translated_english: The control system including the valve actuator of all regulat valves is displayed, such as power failure, etc.
data.enhanced_english: The control system including the valve actuator of all regulat valves is displayed, such as power failure, etc.

data.original_korean: 고유번호, 종류, 형식, 기능
data.translated_english: Unique number, type, format, function
data.enhanced_english: Unique number, type, format, function

data.original_korean: 벤트는 타워(Tower)나 수직 용기의 꼭대기에 설치하여야 한다
data.translated_english: The vent should be installed at the top of the tower or the vertical container.
data.enhanced_english: The vent should be installed at the top of the tower or the vertical container.

data.original_korean: 수직 용기(Vertical vessel)의 드레인은 출구 배관의 바닥에 설치하여야 한다
data.translated_english: The drain of the vertical vessel must be installed on the floor of the outlet pipe.
data.enhanced_english: The drain of the vertical vessel must be installed on the floor of the outlet pipe.

data.original_korean: 배관 시스템에서 벤트와 드레인은 <표 2>에 따른다
data.translated_english: In the pipe system, the vent and the drain are followed by <Table 2>.
data.enhanced_english: In the pipe system, the vent and the drain are followed by <Table 2>.

data.original_korean: 분산제어시스템(DCS) 또는 아날로그 등 제어장치의 구분
data.translated_english: Division of control devices such as distributed control system (DCS) or analog
data.enhanced_english: Division of control devices such as distributed control system (DCS) or analog

data.original_korean: 열교환기의 냉각수의 설계온도는 90℃로 한다
data.translated_english: The design temperature of the coolant of the heat exchanger shall be 90 ℃
data.enhanced_english: The design temperature of the coolant of the heat exchanger shall be 90 ℃

data.original_korean: 최대운전압력이 게이지 압력으로 7 MPa(70 kgf/㎠) 이하인 공정용기의 설계 압력은 아래의 수치 중 가장 큰 것으로 한다. -최대 운전 압력 + 180 kPa(1.8 kgf/㎠) -최대 운전 압력 x 1.1 -350 kPa(3.5 kgf/㎠) (설계를 고려한 최소값)
data.translated_english: The design pressure of the process container, with the maximum operation pressure of 7 MPA (70 kgf/) or less with the gauge pressure, is the largest of the numbers below. -The maximum operation pressure + 180 kPa (1.8 kgf/) -Maximum driving pressure x 1.1 -350 kPa (3.5 kgf/) (minimum value considering design)
data.enhanced_english: The design pressure of the process container, with the maximum operation pressure of 7 MPA (70 kgf/) or less with the gauge pressure, is the largest of the numbers below. -The maximum operation pressure + 180 kPa (1.8 kgf/) -Maximum driving pressure x 1.1 -350 kPa (3.5 kgf/) (minimum value considering design)

data.original_korean: 최대운전압력이 게이지 압력으로 7 MPa(70 kgf/㎠)를 초과하는 공정용기의 설계 압력은 아래의 수치 중 큰 것으로 한다. -최대 운전 압력 + 700 kPa(7 kgf/㎠) -최대 운전 압력 x 1.05
data.translated_english: The maximum operation pressure of the process container exceeding 7 mpa (70 kgf/cm 2) with a gauge pressure shall be largely among the numbers below. -Maximum operation pressure + 700 kPa (7 kgf/) -Maximum operation pressure x 1.05
data.enhanced_english: The maximum operation pressure of the process container exceeding 7 mpa (70 kgf/cm 2) with a gauge pressure shall be largely among the numbers below. -Maximum operation pressure + 700 kPa (7 kgf/) -Maximum operation pressure x 1.05

data.original_korean: 설계온도는 최고운전온도에 30℃를 더한 값으로 한다
data.translated_english: The design temperature is added to the maximum operation temperature of 30 ℃.
data.enhanced_english: The design temperature is added to the maximum operation temperature of 30 ℃.

data.original_korean: 부유식 지붕탱크의 설계압력은 양압 2,000 Pa(0.0204 kgf/㎠), 진공압력 250 Pa(0.0025 kgf/㎠)이내로 한다
data.translated_english: The design pressure of the floating roof tank shall be within 2,000 PA (0.0204 kgf/), a vacuum pressure 250 PA (0.0025 kgf/)
data.enhanced_english: Storage tank The design pressure of the floating roof tank shall be within 2,000 PA (0.0204 kgf/), a vacuum pressure 250 PA (0.0025 kgf/)

data.original_korean: 저장물질의 온도에 30℃를 더한 값으로 한다
data.translated_english: It is a value that adds 30 ℃ to the temperature of the storage material.
data.enhanced_english: It is a value that adds 30 ℃ to the temperature of the storage material.

data.original_korean: 스팀을 사용하여 상압저장탱크를 청소할 필요가 있는 경우에는 설계온도를 120℃로 한다
data.translated_english: If it is necessary to clean the steam tank using steam, the design temperature is 120 ℃.
data.enhanced_english: If it is necessary to clean the steam tank using steam, the design temperature is 120 ℃.

data.original_korean: 정상운전압력이 7 MPa(70 kgf/㎠) 이하인 경우 열교환기의 설계압력은 아래의 수치 중 가장 큰 것으로 한다. -최고운전압력 + 180 kPa(1.8 kgf/㎠) -최고운전압력 x 1.1 -520 kPa(5.3 kgf/㎠) (TEMA 기준, 최소 설계압력)
data.translated_english: If the normal operation pressure is less than 7 mpa (70 kgf/) or less, the design pressure of the heat exchanger shall be the largest of the numbers below. -The highest operation pressure + 180 kPa (1.8 kgf/) -The highest driving pressure x 1.1 -520 kPa (5.3 kgf/) (Tema, minimum design pressure)
data.enhanced_english: If the normal operation pressure is less than 7 mpa (70 kgf/) or less, the design pressure of the heat exchanger shall be the largest of the numbers below. -The highest operation pressure + 180 kPa (1.8 kgf/) -The highest driving pressure x 1.1 -520 kPa (5.3 kgf/) (Tema, minimum design pressure)

data.original_korean: 정상운전압력이 7 MPa(70 kgf/㎠) 초과인 경우 열교환기의 설계압력은 아래의 수치 중 큰 것으로 한다. -최고운전압력 + 700 kPa(7 kgf/㎠) -최고운전압력 x 1.05
data.translated_english: If the normal operation pressure is exceeded 7 mpa (70 kgf/), the design pressure of the heat exchanger shall be largely among the numbers below. -The highest driving pressure + 700 kPa (7 kgf/) -The best operation pressure x 1.05
data.enhanced_english: If the normal operation pressure is exceeded 7 mpa (70 kgf/), the design pressure of the heat exchanger shall be largely among the numbers below. -The highest driving pressure + 700 kPa (7 kgf/) -The best operation pressure x 1.05

data.original_korean: 열교환기의 설계온도는 열교환기 인입부에서의 최고운전온도에 30℃를 더한 값으로 한다
data.translated_english: The design temperature of the heat exchanger shall be a value that adds 30 ℃ to the maximum operation temperature in the heat exchanger.
data.enhanced_english: The design temperature of the heat exchanger shall be a value that adds 30 ℃ to the maximum operation temperature in the heat exchanger.
